subject: Running
lead_paragraph: Peter Kirui of Kenya won the Peachtree Road Race in Atlanta. The defending men’s champion of the 10,000-meter race, Sammy Kitwara of Kenya, finished eighth.
snippet: Peter Kirui of Kenya won the Peachtree Road Race in Atlanta. The defending men’s champion of the 10,000-meter race, Sammy Kitwara of Kenya, finished eighth.
